videos.headline: WR Modster tightropes a TD catch for Boise State
videos.description: Boise State QB Brett Rypien rips a 20-yard touchdown pass to WR Sean Modster

videos.headline: Troy RB Daughtry-Frye cashes in TD after Boise State turnover
videos.description: Troy RB Jabir Daughtry-Frye has a 23-yard  rushing touchdown after a Boise State turnover.

videos.headline: Troy's Murray recovers fumble
videos.description: Troy's Tyler Murray recovers the Boise State fumble on a punt return.

videos.headline: Boise State QB Rypien rips 53-yard TD pass to Thomas
videos.description: Boise State QB Brett Rypien throws 53-yard TD pass to WR CT Thomas to put them up 14-7.

videos.headline: Boise State Rypien 46-yard pass to Modster leads to TD
videos.description: Boise State WR Sean Modster catches 46-yard pass from QB Brett  Rypien which leads to a touchdown.

videos.headline: Boise State QB Rypien throws his 4th TD of the first half
videos.description: Boise State QB Brett Rypien throws  a 54-yard TD to WR Sean Modster for his fourth TD of the half.

videos.headline: Boise State's Horton recovers fumble for TD
videos.description: Boise State's Tyler Horton recovers and returns Troy B.J. Smith's fumble for TD.

videos.headline: Troy QB Barker throws TD to keep game in reach
videos.description: Troy's Kaleb Barker throws 33-yard TD to WR Deondre Douglas on a critical fourth down.

videos.headline: Boise State QB Cord runs in 1st career TD
videos.description: Boise State QB Chase Cord runs in a 44-yard TD to put exclamation point on Boise State's win.
